data.fullContent: Recently, Robert graduated from college and accepted the job of his dreams. He was offered the position as secretary at a family law firm. After accepting the job, Robert became very excited. He was eager to begin his new job. The law firm was big and very professional, and he felt like he would be stepping up in the legal world. He also liked that he would be starting a new job at the beginning of the year, so he would be fresh and full of energy. Now he could move on with his life!

q1.translation: 最近，罗伯特大学毕业，并接受了他的梦想的工作。一家家庭律师事务所给他提供了秘书的职位。接受这份工作后，罗伯特变得非常兴奋。
q1.front: Recently, Robert graduated from college and accepted the job of his dreams. He was offered the position as secretary at a family law firm. After accepting the job, Robert became very excited.
q1.content: Recently, Robert graduated from college and accepted the job of his dreams. He was ____ the position as secretary at a family ____ firm. After accepting the ____, Robert became ____ excited.

q2.translation: 最近，罗伯特大学毕业了，并接受了他梦寐以求的工作。他得到了一家家庭律师事务所秘书的职位。接受工作后，罗伯特变得非常兴奋。他急于开始他的新工作。这家律师事务所很大，也很专业，他觉得自己在法律界的地位会越来越高。他也喜欢在年初开始一份新的工作，这样他就会精神焕发，充满活力。现在他可以继续他的生活了!
q2.front: Recently, Robert graduated from college and accepted the job of his dreams. He was offered the position as secretary at a family law firm. After accepting the job, Robert became very excited.
q2.middle: He was eager to begin his new job.
q2.ending: The law firm was big and very professional, and he felt like he would be stepping up in the legal world. He also liked that he would be starting a new job at the beginning of the year, so he would be fresh and full of energy. Now he could move on with his life!
